author: breser
msg: SWIG INSTALL documentation tweaks.
* subversion/bindings/swig/INSTALL
Fix documentation on testing Perl bindings.
Add documentation talking about specifying the right python and perl
executables at configure time.

author: xsteve
msg: Use read-directory-name if it is available, otherwise use read-file-name to get
a directory name from the user
* trunk/contrib/client-side/psvn/psvn.el:
(svn-status): Use read-directory-name instead of read-file-name to read a directory name
(svn-status-mv): Use read-directory-name instead of read-file-name to read a directory name

author: kfogel
msg: Revert r10100, as Ben Reser's objections were stronger than I realized.
See http://subversion.tigris.org/servlets/ReadMsg?list=dev&msgNo=70192.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/validate.c
(svn_mime_type_is_binary): No longer treat XML types as non-binary.

author: jpieper
msg: Issue #1509: Work around the fact that a user can't set executable
permissions on files they do not own by moving and copying the file
around to make it such that the current user does own the file.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/io.c
(APR_IS_STATUS_EPERM): Work around APR's missing support for the
EPERM error.
(reown_file): New, moves a file to a temporary location, then copies
it back so as to create a new version that is owned by the current
user.
(svn_io_set_file_executable): If the original permissions set fails
in the stat-available path, try again after having re-owned the
file.

author: gerhardoettl
msg: initial translation of ch09.xml and ch08.xml
* doc/translations/german/book/ch09.xml
* doc/translations/german/book/ch08.xml
